Posts.Content: May 25, 2018 03:01PM poullots wrote: hi my 14 yr. old daughter has had the same thing for about a yr now but the docs keep telling me that it will go away in time that surgery isn"t needed no biopsy done it bothers her so much especially when she plays sports i think thats why she has not wanted to play her favorite sport football again she is afraid the lump will get hit cause it hurts if it gets hit.
